title: ChatGPT prompts: How to optimize for sales, marketing, writing, and more
description: Capable of writing emails, essays and more given a few short prompts, ChatGPT has become one of the fastest-growing apps in history. Beyond that, it’s begun to find a place in the enterprise, particularly with the launch of plugins that connect the chatbot to third-party apps, websites and services.

title: Meta is rolling out Instagram Broadcast channels globally.
description: Not to be confused with WhatsApp’s recently added Channels feature or Instagram’s Twitter competitor that was recently shown to employees, Meta is rolling out the Telegram-like Broadcast Channels for use by everyone around the world.

title: Stack Overflow survey finds developers are ready to use AI tools — even if they don’t fully trust them.
description: The coding Q&A site is embracing generative AI, but its moderators are on strike over its policies. Its annual developer survey reflects this tension over AI coding..
